title: Summoner Icons
body: I have been recently looking though store and i have noticed that whenever a summoners icon does come out its not 1500ip or 250 Rp its just 250 Rp and i was wondering why is that? i dont really want to spend Rp to get a icon.. but it was awesome that they were 1500ip for a little while before just going to 250 Rp. so I'm curious to know, why has it changed? can anyone link me to any forum posts or any sites regarding that change. thank you
